```{r load_packages, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE} 
library(dplyr)
library(fontawesome)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
```

```{r eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
unchecked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("square", fill = "steelblue"))

checked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("check-square", fill = "steelblue"))

wk_post <- tibble(
"Qualtrics?" = c(unchecked,
                 checked,
                 unchecked),

"eCampus?" = c(checked,
               unchecked,
               unchecked),

Description = c("Submit a one paragraph narrative about your survey.",
                "Submit a draft survey.",
                "Watch a two-part walkthrough on accessing the Qualtrics API visa R."),

Location = c("[Link](/assignment/05-assignment/#submit-1)", 
             "[Link](/assignment/05-assignment/#submit-1)",
             "[Link](/example/06-example/#using-the-qualtrics-api-1)")

)
```

### What's Due?

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
kable(wk_post, 
      escape = FALSE,
      align = 'cll') %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = FALSE) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "10em") %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "20em") %>%
  column_spec(3, width = "20em")
```
